title: Wzrd Bikes Protect Trans Wzrds Posters
content:
Em from Wzrd Bikes has a fundraiser print for sale in the Wzrd Bikes webshop. The funds from the sale of this Protect Trans Wzrds poster will help pay Em’s bills while they undergo gender affirming surgery. So, if you can and are able to help out, here’s the link to the posters. We wish Em a speedy recovery and wanted to send them love.

The post Wzrd Bikes Protect Trans Wzrds Posters appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
